posts.description: The Happy-Go-Lucky Jewish Group That Connects Trump and Putin - POLITICO Magazine
posts.extended: Chabad of Port Washington, a Jewish community center on Long Island’s Manhasset Bay, sits in a squat brick edifice across from a Shell gas station and a strip mall.

If you are even remotely associated to the web or technology industry in any way, chances are, you might have come across the most popular design role in technology these days - UX Designer. You may have even heard of the double-decker — UI/UX Designer (don’t even get me started on that).

posts.description: What’s Your Most Awkward Team-Building Experience? - Bloomberg
posts.extended: “At a previous job, our boss would sometimes take us bowling. This time, though, he wanted to go paintballing. I’m not a good shot, and I wasn’t aiming for him, but my paintball went awry. The next thing I knew, he was on the floor.
